description: Twitter clone with most of the features from the original. You can create your own account, add tweets and many more
Photo tagging app, based on Where's Waldo books. Your task is to find all characters in shortest time possible. The scoreboard is included.
Test your memory - get points by clicking on an images but don't click on any more than once!The cards are taken from Blizzard's Entertainment game called Hearthstone.
Shopping cart created in React with the use of Fake Store API. There are all functionalities that are available in real-life shop
Weather app that allows you to check the weather in any city on planet Earth. It was created with the use OpenWeatherAPI
To-do app lets you write, organize, and prioritize your tasks. You can create new projects/lists, that contains tasks to do. The tasks are stored in localStorage
